name: Marimo - Moss Ball Aquarium
description:
This is the best Marimo app.
- You can know growth of Marimo in real time. This feature is available on this app only.
- Cool and beautiful aquarium.
- Simple and easy.

Marimo is a water plant looks like green ball.
Care is very easy. You should change the water only once a week.
Marimo is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of Marimo in your daily life!
